title: PING higher than normal. have a tracert report
body:
My in game PING is significantly higher than it used to be (like it was around 30, but now 80+). 
This issue started since last month and I cant seem to figure out what's going wrong...
Any other games I play are totally fine with a PING around 15ish. 
I have run a Tracert Analyze as shown below.  I am around Iowa area.

Can someone tell me what goes wrong and how to fix it? It really making me feel uncomfortable during games...

|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

|                                      WinMTR statistics                                   |

|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |

|------------------------------------------------|------|------|------|------|------|------|

|                             192.168.1.1 -    0 |  443 |  443 |    0 |    0 |    1 |    0 |

| ics-173-240-196-126.icsincorporated.com -    0 |  443 |  443 |    0 |    0 |    1 |    0 |

| ics-173-240-196-193.icsincorporated.com -    0 |  443 |  443 |    0 |    0 |  166 |    0 |

|                              10.55.2.21 -    0 |  443 |  443 |    0 |    7 |  207 |    0 |

|    ins-db1-et-11-4-3011.desm.netins.net -    0 |  443 |  443 |    3 |    3 |    5 |    3 |

|            ins-kc2-po20.kmrr.netins.net -    0 |  443 |  443 |    4 |    4 |    6 |    5 |

|               10ge7-3.core1.oma1.he.net -    0 |  443 |  443 |   11 |   14 |   23 |   17 |

|              10ge3-11.core1.den1.he.net -    0 |  443 |  443 |   37 |   40 |   51 |   37 |

|                   No response from host -  100 |   88 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |

|                          104.160.138.35 -    0 |  443 |  443 |   55 |   55 |   73 |   55 |

|          ae34-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net -    0 |  443 |  443 |   75 |   75 |   99 |   76 |

|                           104.160.131.1 -    0 |  443 |  443 |   74 |   74 |   84 |   74 |

|________________________________________________|______|______|______|______|______|______|

   WinMTR v0.92 GPL V2 by Appnor MSP - Fully Managed Hosting & Cloud Provider

replies.body: Thanks for the traceroute!  Assuming icsincorporated is your ISP, it looks like it's having some hiccups along the way and the hiccups continue throughout your trip to the game server.  You can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help things tune up a bit, specifically the Configure DNS which can help change how you route.  Otherwise, you'll want to hit up your ISP and let them know about this so they can check out the node.  I hope that helps!
